item.title: ‘The Repair Shop’ Host Jay Blades Pleads Not Guilty to Rape Charges
item.description: Jay Blades, the former host of BBC’s “The Repair Shop,” pleaded not guilty to two counts of rape at Shrewsbury Crown Court on Wednesday. The 55-year-old broadcaster denied the charge
